EmailTemplate.name: 201808_Global_Email_JetWave_WebCast_TM.201808_Global_Email_JetWave_EmailInviteWe
EmailTemplate.subject: Free Webcast - Experience the High Speed Wi-Fi Advantage: Jet ConneX Powered by JetWave™
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
The secret is out, a consistent, global and high-speed Wi-Fi connection is available now to stream videos, connect to VPNs, download large files and more - anywhere you fly!
Join our webcast on September 11 at 8:00 a.m. PT / 11:00 a.m. ET to see for yourself how you can get revolutionary in-flight Wi-Fi for office and home-like connectivity in the sky. Our webcast will feature our technical experts as well as owners and operators who have used our connectivity solutions. Presentation will feature information about our JetWave™ Hardware and Jet ConneX service.
Check out our webcast Experience the High Speed Wi-Fi Advantage to see for yourself.
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201809_JetWave_WebCast.html]]>
